function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increased occurrence of typhoons, hurricanes, and extreme weather conditions leading to loss of lives, properties, and infodemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban park use declined during the covid-19 pandemic, leading to more homogenous use by specific
